entities.name: ravenclaws
entities.description: The Ravenclaws were all backing away, and some of the most frightened began scampering back up the staircase to their beds.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry was wondering whether he ought not to blast the door open and Stun Amycus before the Death Eater could do anything else

entities.name: amykus
entities.description: Amycus shouted 'Trying — to get — through this damned — door!' and asked Professor McGonagall to get Flitwick.

entities.name: professor carrow
entities.description: A second, most familiar voice rang out beyond the door. 'May I ask what you are doing, Professor Carrow?'

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Professor McGonagall suggested that Flitwick could open the door for Amycus.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall asked if Amycus's sister was in the room and offered to get Flitwick to open the door.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: Harry was wondering whether he ought not to blast the door open and Stun Amycus before the Death Eater could do anything else

relationships.description: Amycus shouted 'Go and get Flitwick! Get him to open it, now!'
Professor McGonagall suggested that Flitwick could open the door for Amycus.
